CustomField.formula: if(Distinct_Call__c = "Manual OB", false, IF(Distinct_Call__c = "Manual IB", false, IF(Distinct_Call__c = "Manual Call", false, if(Distinct_Call__c = "CAS OB", TRUE, IF(and(Distinct_Call__c = "8x8 IB",CallDurationInSeconds >=10), TRUE, IF(and(Distinct_Call__c = "8x8 OB",CallDurationInSeconds >=10), TRUE, FALSE ))))))
CustomField.label: Call Check
